trends: There have been no other sightings in Acireale
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Several discs deploying from east of Mt. Etna, Sicily, moving in pairs towards SW.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding out in back yard at around 10 PM . I am living in Sicily near a town named Acireale. Looking up in a NE direction, It looked like a star was acting strange. I saw two small discs appear and move down to about 1km in a sweeping arc and accelerate towards the SW. In about a minute, a single disc appeared from the original star position and follow the same path as the first two. About 15 sec. two more appeared but moved directly south. Last two discs appeared and followed the south path. Speed was extreame, discs moved from star position to South, SW in less than three seconds.
